description: Try our easy to follow Cheat's Curried Sausage Pot Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheat's Curried Sausage Pot Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g MasterFoods curried sausages simmer sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven grill on mediumhigh. Spoon sausage mixture among 4 x 11/2-cup capacity ramekins, then top with a spoonful of mash. Drizzle with remaining oil and season. Grill for 5 minutes or until golden. Serve.
